be made the vehicle for 
<s>prepare certain <\s> the publication 
of mere zoological details 
In thus recommending 
that Mr MacDonalds papers 
should not appear in 
the Transactions, however,
I would be particularly 
understood not to 
detract from their scientific 
merits which are very great.
Thomas H. Huxley 
The Committee of Papers 
R. S.
